me.soxey6.engine.managers.sound

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.soxey6.engine.managers.sound.Audio

  • public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a light wrapper for SlickUtil's Audio interface. Nothing more.
